metadata.title: CVE-2016-7098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Race condition in wget 1.17 and earlier, when used in recursive ormirroring mode to download a single file, might allow remote servers tobypass intended access list restrictions by keeping an HTTP connectionopen.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.15-1ubuntu1.14.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.15-1ubuntu1.14.04.3').
